summary: Mi hermano, Seokjin, no es un genio, solo es un chico que, al igual que tú, se dio cuenta que la única manera de alcanzar lo que...
body: Mi hermano, Seokjin, no es un genio, solo es un chico que, al igual que tú, se dio cuenta que la única manera de alcanzar lo que quería era trabajando duro, Y eso, Tae, no puedes comprarlo. puedes pagar lecciones de baile, puedes pagar lecciones de canto, puedes pagarte un taller de dibujo y más. pero si no tienes paciencia, si no sabes el significado del trabajo, entonces nada de esto sirve, porque la perseverancia que desprecias, definitivamente es algo que no puedes comprar.

blog.name: ao3feed-yoonseok
blog.title: Hwagae Market
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jung Hoseok|J-Hope/Min Yoongi|Suga tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: Enlazado con Jimin
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2HrDIVY

by HobiPasivaDeTodos

Hoseok no sabía que esperaba ver en el castillo del príncipe de los vampiros, pero no era eso. ¿Dónde estaban las paredes cubiertas de sangre y los cuerpos drenados revistiendo los pasillos? era antinatural ver el mármol caramelo veteado que cubría el piso y fuertes hombres que actuaban como guardias.

Obligado por su padre a acompañar a su hermana, Sooyoung, caminaba a través de los ventilados pasillos, viendo con sorpresa los invaluables objetos colocados con gran precisión. No era la fría cueva que imaginaba en sus sueños.

Hasta el momento había sido una fácil, aunque inquietante misión. Era difícil proteger a su hermana de una indeseada atención mientras usaba un velo que cubría su cara. Atención que era difícil que ella obtuviera en el palacio del príncipe de los vampiros, pero ese era el trabajo que le habían asignado y él se tomaba seriamente sus responsabilidades y la seguridad de su hermana.

Words: 5330, Chapters: 1/1, Language: Español

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Park Jimin, Jung Hoseok
  • Relationships: JiHope, minhope
  • Additional Tags: jimintop, jiminactivo, topjimin, BottomHoseok, BottomHobi, hoseokpasivo, hoseokbottom, hobibottom, hobipasivo

title: Phantasia
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Jh1YvO

by smrldjin

After his parents take away his piano, Yoongi takes his friend’s advice and visits the abandoned music room of Building B. He had no idea that he would be finding much more than what he was looking for.

OR (Hoseok’s version):

Yoongi, the bravest knight, embarks on an adventure to recover the treasure that was taken from him. He climbs the stairs, crosses all the obstacles and arrives at the chamber promised by the prophecy of the amazing wizard Hoseok, to find out it is guarded by the most beautiful creature he has ever seen. Is it a skilled pianist? Or the owner of a beautiful voice? Or an angel locked up for centuries waiting to be found? It doesn’t matter, the only thing our hero knows is that fate took him there to meet his muse, the one that from that moment took over his heart forever.

Words: 1814, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Min Yoongi | Suga, Jung Hoseok | J-Hope, Park Jimin (BTS), Jeon Jungkook, Kim Taehyung | V
  • Relationships: Min Yoongi | Suga/Park Jimin, Jung Hoseok | J-Hope/Min Yoongi | Suga
  • Additional Tags: Love at First Sight, Fantasy, Magic, Fluff and Angst, it’s all about the feels, every detail matters, pay attention, Angst, High School, Dancer Park Jimin (BTS), Musician Min Yoongi | Suga, there’s no logic or science in this

summary: ‣ Exes Prompt List 6 ⌜My mum was so upset we broke up and is bugging me about it, so can you put me out of my misery and just...
body:
‣ Exes Prompt List

6 ⌜My mum was so upset we broke up and is bugging me about it, so can you put me out of my misery and just say we’re back together for her sake⌟

‣ Genre; Fluff

‣ Word Count; 963

“Yes, mum. Yes. I said yes! But-” You groaned into your phone as you walked out of class, the moment you did your mum calling you. It seems to have become a habit for her to call you a few times a week, more than she should about the one person you want to keep private from talking about with others. But who ever said mothers knew what boundaries are? Yours doesn’t, that’s sure. “This is my goddamn life! I- Fine. Fine. Everything for your perfect little-”

Before you could cuss her out, she ended the phone call, giving you the excuse that ‘she’s cooking, the food will get burnt’. Of course, every time you try and get her in the right mind, she doesn’t want to hear it. Because mothers are right always. Right? Wrong, they’re just going to get hurt if they are being told otherwise.

You stomped downstairs and passed by multiple students as you tried to get past them and walk into the dance room, bumping into a few and muttering angry apologies. You finally made your way in and walked towards the man sitting down on a chair, writing down on a small notebook with his favorite pen- that stupid notebook he had for his classes; you’ve written in that one before, saying you wanted to fill his notes with prettier handwriting than his. 

You pulled another chair and dropped your bag right next to it, placing it backward and sitting with your chest pressed against the back of it, leaning forward to get his attention. Hoseok stopped writing and a small amused smile formed on his lips at how serious you were being. He found it funny for you to be serious since you never actually were. That wasn’t you, most of the time you’d crack jokes out of the blue even if you tried to keep a straight face. But he wouldn’t know, maybe you changed, you’ve been ignoring him for a while now. He looked up at you and chuckled slightly, closing his notebook on his lap. “What the hell is so funny?” You grunted.

“Your face” He chuckled again. “You’re lucky all students left. With these glares, they might have considered reporting you to the office for threatening a teacher”

You rolled your eyes but shook your head. “I need your help”

“My help? With what?”

“My mother,”

He knitted his eyebrows together and put his notebook aside, seeing you were somewhat serious this time. “Your mother? What about her? Are you trying to find a boyfriend and remembered how much she likes me so you thought ‘oh she loves him, let’s go with him’? Ah, by the way, tell her thank you for me. Those white chocolate cookies she sent me a couple of days ago were heavenly” 

“Wait- what? She sent you cookies?” You asked, dumbfounded.

“Yeah, she didn’t tell you?”

“No, she- Ugh this doesn’t matter right now” You whined. “My mum has been the worst pain in the ass-”

“Hey, don’t talk about her like that” He shook his head.

“Does it matter?!” You groaned. “Jesus, maybe you should date each other”He chuckled and shook his head at your words. 

“Okay, okay. Why has she been a pain in the ass?” He asked in a softer tone.

“Because. Ever since it slipped that we broke up she’s been bugging me about it. As if it’s her life, as if, I don’t know. As if it was the worst decision I’ve ever made! Worse than when I told her that I want to take up dancing instead of law school” You sighed loudly and looked away from him, the eye contact not helping you calm down any bit.

“Maybe it was the worst decision you’ve ever made” He shrugged. “I mean, you’re coming here, to me, for the first time after a month to do what? Ask for my help? What did you help me with? The only thing you did was break up with me with the excuse that you can’t date your dance tutor anymore because it doesn’t help you concentrate”

“Hobi, please” You sighed again, louder. “It’s nothing big. All you have to do is call her, tell her about those stupid cookies, talk to her about how happy you are that we’re back together and boom, the end! No biggie” You laughed awkwardly, saying it all at once.

“We’re what?” He raised an eyebrow. 

“Just tell her that! She’ll stop bothering me and you’ll get more free cookies. It’s a win-win” You said. He parted his lips to speak, but before he could actually say anything, you grabbed his hand gently. “Just do it for me, Hoseok”

He let out a sigh and let his hand slip from yours even if he loved the touch and craved it, making your heart drop. It shouldn’t drop. It shouldn’t if it was your decision but it does and he’s right. It’s probably one of the worst decisions you’ve ever made out of pure fear. He nodded and looked up at you. “Okay. I’ll call her tomorrow, not now. I’ll let her know, I’ll sugarcoat everything and you’re gonna be good to go”

You smiled lightly and stood up, taking your bag. “Thank you”

He stood up to follow you towards the door, but before you could walk out, he pulled your wrist and got you back inside, closing the door and pressing you against it, locking it with his other hand. “Where do you think you’re going? You think now that you’re here I’m going to let you walk out on me again? I think I deserve an explanation if you want me to pretend to be your boyfriend again. Oh and let me remind you. Almost fiance”

⁝ Masterlist

blog.name: hopekook-gives-me-life
blog.title: The Golden Duo
blog.description: A place for hopekook lovers to unite! note: I do not ship these two. I just adore their friendship and the way Hoseok takes care of Jungkook - expect a lot of low quality gifs bc your girl’s one braincell doesn’t know how to produce good quality ones - this is my side blog so I won't be able to respond to comments though you're always welcome to send an ask or just say hi!! I want everyone to feel welcome here! :D haters will be blocked
